description: As a Lead Developer, I navigated a challenging and thrilling journey, guiding the creation and perfection of both the website and API for an eCommerce platform of a UK-based company specializing in the sale of audio software products.

achievements.title: Designed and Implemented Robust API & Database
achievements.description: Engineered a scalable API and database architecture, ensuring seamless communication between front-end and back-end components, resulting in improved system reliability and performance.

achievements.title: Innovative A/B Audio Player Development
achievements.description: Designed and built a custom interactive A/B audio player, enhancing user engagement and providing a unique and immersive audio experience.

achievements.title: Developed Intuitive Admin Dashboards
achievements.description: Architected and implemented a user-friendly admin dashboard, providing an efficient interface for administrators to manage and monitor key aspects of the system.

achievements.title: Active Involvement in Decision-Making
achievements.description: Contributed significantly to strategic decision-making processes, providing valuable input on technology choices, feature prioritization, and overall project direction.

achievements.title: Optimized website SEO and Performance
achievements.description: Made SEO improvements and speed optimizations, leading to better search rankings and faster, smoother user experience.

achievements.title: Effective Team Management and Leadership
achievements.description: Managed and led a team of developers, promoting a collaborative and productive work environment, resulting in successful project delivery and the achievement of team goals.

achievements.title: Integrated Payment Gateways for Seamless Transactions
achievements.description: Successfully integrated and configured payment processing systems, including Stripe and PayPal, ensuring secure and efficient online transactions for enhanced user experience.

achievements.title: Contributed to Page Design and Aesthetics
achievements.description: Played a key role in the design process, contributing creative insights and collaborating with design teams to create visually appealing and user-friendly web pages.

description: Played a key role in the development and administration of an eCommerce website for a company focused on audio plugins development.

achievements.title: Led the Development of an eCommerce Website and System
achievements.description: Directed the end-to-end development of a comprehensive eCommerce website and system, including secure payment processing, inventory management, and a user-friendly shopping experience.

achievements.title: Effectively Managed and Led Development Teams
achievements.description: Showed effective leadership by managing a team of developers, encouraging collaboration for successful project completion.

achievements.title: Provided Input in Decision-Making Processes
achievements.description: Played a key role in strategic decision-making, contributing insights on technology choices, feature prioritization, and guiding the overall direction of projects.

achievements.title: Architected and Implemented API & Database
achievements.description: Designed and implemented a robust API and database infrastructure, ensuring seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.

achievements.title: Implemented strategic SEO enhancements and performance optimizations
achievements.description: Applied targeted SEO enhancements and performance improvements, leading to higher search rankings and enhanced user experience speed and responsiveness.

achievements.title: Successfully integrated and configured Stripe and PayPal payment processing
achievements.description: Efficiently integrated Stripe and PayPal payment systems, ensuring secure and seamless online transactions for an enhanced user experience.

description: In my initial role as a Full-time Full Stack Developer within a prominent tech company, I took on the challenge of overseeing multiple projects concurrently, collaborating closely with a skilled team of managers, designers and developers.

achievements.title: Collaborated with Cross-Functional Teams on Diverse Projects
achievements.description: Played an integral role in cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration and synergy to deliver successful projects.

achievements.title: Managed IoT API Infrastructure for Seamless Integration
achievements.description: Oversaw the management and optimization of IoT API systems, ensuring seamless integration and communication between devices and platforms.

achievements.title: Transformed Standard Websites into React-Based Interactive Platforms
achievements.description: Led the conversion of multiple websites into React-based interactive platforms, enhancing user engagement and modernizing the user experience.

achievements.title: Developed and Deployed Server Monitoring Systems
achievements.description: Guided the implementation of robust server monitoring systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

achievements.title: Partnered with Incubated Startups to Create Customized Websites
achievements.description: Collaborated closely with incubated startups to design and develop personalized websites, aligning with their unique visions and goals.

achievements.title: Contributed to Developers Recruitment and Onboarding
achievements.description: Played a pivotal role in the recruitment process, identifying top talent and supporting the seamless onboarding of new developers into the team.

description: During an intensive 8-month period, I actively applied the range of technologies I had learned to a variety of projects. These included both personal endeavors and freelance work, offering me practical experience in real-world settings.

achievements.title: Contributed to Freelance Projects, Providing Custom Solutions
achievements.description: Successfully completed various freelance projects, leveraging expertise to deliver customized solutions that met the unique needs and requirements of clients.

achievements.title: Studied and practiced making Shopify themes.
achievements.description: Gained proficiency in crafting Shopify themes through focused study and hands-on practice. By immersing myself in theme design and customization, I developed the skills to create tailored solutions for diverse client needs.

achievements.title: Refined Front-End Development skills through personal projects.
achievements.description: Created several websites emphasizing front-end design and functionality, enhancing user experience and interface aesthetics.

achievements.title: Architected a React Chat Application
achievements.description: Designed and developed a React-based chat application, showcasing mastery of modern web development frameworks and technologies, while providing users with an intuitive communication platform.

achievements.title: Crafted an Employees Management Software as part of Computer Science School Thesis
achievements.description: Conceptualized and developed a robust employees management software as a crucial component of my Computer Science thesis, showcasing advanced technical skills and problem-solving abilities.

achievements.title: Engineered a Patient Management Software for a Local Medical Center
achievements.description: Led the development of a comprehensive software solution adapted to optimize patient management processes, enhancing efficiency and organization within the medical center.
